extension.name: ZCard
extension.description: It allows to model a new card widget model.

methods.name: New
methods.description: Adds a new Card widget model to the model layout of the RecyclerView which is synced.

methods.name: BuildProps
methods.description: Returns a new property set containing the previously defined properties.

methods.name: SetRadius
methods.description: Changes the radius of the corners of the card widget.

methods.name: SetBackgroundColor
methods.description: Changes the background color of the card.

methods.name: SetCardElevation
methods.description: Changes the elevation of the card.

properties.name: Radius
properties.description:
Specifies the radius of the corners of the card.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Background
properties.description:
Specifies the background of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>If you only want to change the color of the card, it is preferable to use the BackgroundColor.
>It does not maintain the radius of the corners of the card.

properties.name: BackgroundColor
properties.description:
Specifies the background color of the card.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Maintains the radius of the edges of the card.

properties.name: CardElevation
properties.description:
Specifies the elevation of the card.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>The card displays a shadow according to its elevation.
>In order for the shadow to be displayed, the card must have a non-transparent background color.

properties.name: LayoutMetrics
properties.description:
Specifies the set of properties that the parent of the widget will take to create the widget's measures.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingLeft
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the left edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingRight
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the right edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingTop
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the top edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: PaddingBottom
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the bottom edge and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Padding
properties.description:
Specifies the space between the edges and the content of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget is enabled.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Visible
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget is visible (true) or invisible (false).
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Being invisible, it does not occupy any space.

properties.name: Clickable
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget can be clicked.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: LongClickable
properties.description:
Specifies if the widget can be long clicked.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Alpha
properties.description:
Specifies the opacity of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>Range from 0.0 (0% visible) to 1.0 (100% visible)
